title: The atheist's tragedie: or The honest man's reuenge As in diuers places it hath often beene acted. Written by Cyril Tourneur.
author: Tourneur, Cyril, 1575?-1626.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed [by Thomas Snodham] for Iohn Stepneth, and Richard Redmer, and are to be sold at their shops at the west end of Paules,
